0.name: The tunnel
desc: "   Suddenly you feel that the tunnel leads slightly down.. The only
exit is to the west, and it leads down..

1.name: The long tunnel
desc: "   You are in a long east-west leading tunnel. The tunnel is quite
wide at this point.

2.name: The long tunnel
desc: "   You are in a long east-west leading tunnel. The tunnel becomes
narrow to the west.

3.name: The long tunnel
desc: "   You are in a long east-west leading tunnel. The tunnel is quite
narrow at this point. You notice a small hole leading south.

4.name: The long tunnel
desc: "   You are in a long east-west leading tunnel. The tunnel starts sloping
down towards the west.

5.name: The golden cave
desc: "   You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden
light. The cave continues to the south and west.

extra.desc: It looks good, but as you look closely you notice that it has no value.

6.name: The golden cave
desc: "   You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden
light.  The cave continues to the south and east, to the north is a narrow
tunnel.

extra.desc: It looks good, but as you look closely you realize that it has no value.

7.name: The passage
desc: "   You are in a small passage, it leads south, to the west is a golden
cave.

8.name: The golden cave
desc: "   You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden
light. The cave continues to the north and west, east from you there is
a small passage.

extra.desc: It looks good, but as you look closely you notice that it has no value.

9.name: The golden cave
desc: "   You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden
light. The cave continues to the south, east and north.

extra.desc: It looks good, but as you look closely you notice that it has no value.

10.name: The hole
desc: "   You are standing by a large hole in the floor, when you looks down
into the darkness you feel frightened.

11.name: The tunnel
11.desc: "   You are in a small tunnel, it leads from east to the west.

12.name: The tunnel
12.desc: "   You are in a larger tunnel, it leads from west to east.

13.name: The passage
desc: "   You are in a passage that leads towards the south. To the east
you see a tunnel.

14.name: The golden cave
desc: "   You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden
light. The cave continues to the north, to the west you see a dark
passage.

extra.desc: It looks good, but as you look closely you notice that it has no value.

15.name: The dark passage.
desc: "   You are in a dark passage, that leads east. In the ceiling you notice
a small hole, just big enough to pass through.

16.name: The passage
desc: "   You are in a passage that leads north-south. You notice a small
light to the south.

extra.desc: Well you can't see where it comes from..

17.name: The secret tunnel
desc: "   You are in a secret tunnel that leads north, to the south you see
a small chamber.

18.name: The cave
desc: "   You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your
head fire lights the room. The cave continues to the west and south.
To the north a small hole leads to a tunnel.

19.name: The cave
desc: "   You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your
head fire lights the room. The cave continues to the east and south.

20.name: The passage
desc: "   You are in a north-south leading passage. To the south you see
light.

extra.desc: It nearly is enough to light the passage.

21.name: The secret tunnel
desc: "   You are in a secret tunnel that leads west, you feel evilness
approaching you as you continue west.

22.name: The secret chamber
desc: "   You are in a secret chamber, the room is filled with an evil
feeling.

23.name: The cave
desc: "   You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your
head fire lights the room. The cave continues to the north and west.

24.name: The cave
desc: "   You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your
head fire lights the room. The cave continues to the east and north.
To the west a passage leads north.

25.name: The passage
desc: "   You are in a passage, to the east you see a cave. Light from the
cave lights up the passage. To the north the passage leads into
the darkness..
